p: In view of the data we have collected, the expected detection rate of brain infection in patients with spinal infection increases with the following predictive factors: spinal epidural abscess ( n = 32; 6.25%), positive blood culture ( n = 29; 6.9%), and a septic condition upon admission ( n = 12; 16.7%). Figure 1 illustrates a possible decision tree for performing cerebral imaging in order to detect brain infection as well.
